Row.Text: [COLOR_MAGENTA]* National Guild (each player may build one)[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Provides 1 [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person Point (GPP) towards a Great Writer. Add up to two specialists to this building to gain [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and increase the rate of Great Writer acquisition (3 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and 3 [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] GPP per specialist).
